resources.string: set upper limit for battery charge to increase battery life
Values greater than %1$d%% are not recommended due to significant lower battery life
Disable for better file system performance at the risk of data loss in case of a system crash.
When enabled and screen is on, fsync operation is asynchronous. When screen is off, this operation is done synchronously.
big or little cluster will be completly disabled to save battery (do not disable if you have no other hotplug)
enables only litte cluster so save energy in trade for performance
Screen Off behaviour is like screen on for better background tasks and reduced energy saving
delay between load calculations in ms (rw, 0-1000, defaults to 50)
if more than 2 big cpu\'s are above this level vote for little cluster support (rw, 0-100, defaults to 80)
if more than 2 little cpu\'s are below this level vote for disabling little cluster support (rw, 0-100, defaults to 20)
if more up-votes occur then enable the little cluster (rw, 0-99, defaults to 3) vote_threshold_up * sampling_time = \'delay to bring em up\'
if more down-votes occur then disable the little cluster (rw, 0-99, defaults to 3) vote_threshold_down * sampling_time = \'delay to bring em down\'
define the numbers of little cores which stay enabled if screen is off (rw, 1-4, defaults to 4)
